sn46.2:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ayam kayo aharatthitiko, aharam paticca titthati, anaharo no titthati;
sn46.2:1.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, panca nivarana aharatthitika, aharam paticca titthanti, anahara no titthanti.
sn46.2:2.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va kamacchandassa uppadaya, uppannassa va kamacchandassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya?
sn46.2:2.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va kamacchandassa uppadaya, uppannassa va kamacchandassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya.
sn46.2:3.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va byapadassa uppadaya, uppannassa va byapadassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya?
sn46.2:3.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va byapadassa uppadaya, uppannassa va byapadassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya.
sn46.2:4.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va thinamiddhassa uppadaya, uppannassa va thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya?
sn46.2:4.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhita bhattasammado cetaso ca linattam.
sn46.2:4.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va thinamiddhassa uppadaya, uppannassa va thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya.
sn46.2:5.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va uddhaccakukkuccassa uppadaya, uppannassa va uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya?
sn46.2:5.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va uddhaccakukkuccassa uppadaya, uppannassa va uddhaccakukkuccassa bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya.
sn46.2:6.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannaya va vicikicchaya uppadaya, uppannaya va vicikicchaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya?
sn46.2:6.4: ayamaharo anuppannaya va vicikicchaya uppadaya, uppannaya va vicikicchaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya.
sn46.2:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ayam kayo aharatthitiko, aharam paticca titthati, anaharo no titthati;
sn46.2:7.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ime panca nivarana aharatthitika, aharam paticca titthanti, anahara no titthanti.
sn46.2:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ayam kayo aharatthitiko, aharam paticca titthati, anaharo no titthati;
sn46.2:8.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga aharatthitika, aharam paticca titthanti, anahara no titthanti.
sn46.2:9.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va satisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va satisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:9.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va satisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va satisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:10.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va dhammavicayasambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va dhammavicayasambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:10.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalakusala dhamma, savajjanavajja dhamma, hinapanita dhamma, kanhasukkasappatibhaga dhamma.
sn46.2:10.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va dhammavicayasambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va dhammavicayasambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:11.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va viriyasambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va viriyasambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:11.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va viriyasambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va viriyasambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:12.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va pitisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va pitisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:12.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va pitisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va pitisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:13.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va passaddhisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va passaddhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:13.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va passaddhisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va passaddhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:14.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va samadhisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va samadhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:14.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va samadhisambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va samadhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:15.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, aharo anuppannassa va upekkhasambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va upekkhasambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya?
sn46.2:15.4: ayamaharo anuppannassa va upekkhasambojjhangassa uppadaya, uppannassa va upekkhasambojjhangassa bhavanaya paripuriya.
sn46.2:16.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ayam kayo aharatthitiko, aharam paticca titthati, anaharo no titthati;
sn46.2:16.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjhanga aharatthitika, aharam paticca titthanti, anahara no titthanti”ti.
